title.term: line through vector \uvec{x}_0 and parallel to vector \uvec{p} in \R^n

li.p: the set of all vectors \uvec{x} in \R^n of the form \uvec{x} = \uvec{x}_0 + t\uvec{p} for some value of the parameter t

title.term: plane through vector \uvec{x}_0 parallel to the vectors \uvec{p}_1 and \uvec{p}_2 in \R^n

li.p: the set of all vectors \uvec{x} in \R^n of the form \uvec{x}=\uvec{x}_0+s\uvec{p}_1+t\uvec{p}_2 for some values of the parameters s and t

aside.title: Note
aside.p: In this definition, vectors \uvec{p}_1 and \uvec{p}_2 are parallel to the plane, but need to be nonparallel to each other for the terminal points of all the vectors \uvec{x} of the described form to actually trace out a plane.
